*[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] *[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]] *Chests in [[Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''XAttack''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Pokémon's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds. == Details == +50% Bonus to Pokémon's attack == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cerulean City]]|600 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Viridian City]]|600 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|600 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} ===Dungeon Loot=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !
